title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Moyne
creator_credit: David Withers, Roberto Salvatore, Csilla Csongvay, ACMI Content Development and ACMI
brief_description: Nine stories that embrace the spirit of three towns in the Moyne region in Victoria. Through interviews with the locals and footage of the region and various events, this compilation encapsulates life in Victorian towns today, the reasons for choosing the rural life over the city, activities, concerns and the things that bind these small communities together. Filmed as part of ‘ACMI in the regions’.
title_for_label: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Moyne
